attributes.action: Make flood damage compensation to the people of Hull and North Yorkshire a priority to the projected £200 million
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent flooding of Hull and North Yorkshire is a disaster. It is a disaster if you now have no house for 9+ months and no possessions. All very very well giving cash to over-seas disaters, but these people now very much have nothing and it is a disater for them. CHARITY BEGINS AT HOME especially amongst disaffected voters
